Rulings.Edison:
●Telepathic Power targets your opponent's monster that attacked and destroyed your Psychic-Type monster by battle.
●Telepathic Power is activated at the end of the Damage Step, when monsters destroyed by battle are sent to the GY.
●You gain Life Points equal to the ATK of the destroyed monster while it was on the field.

Rulings.Base: 1. "Telepathic Power" targets your opponent's monster that attacked and destroyed your Psychic-Type monster by battle.\n2. "Telepathic Power" is activated at the end of the Damage Step, when monsters destroyed by battle are sent to the GY.\n3. You gain Life Points equal to the ATK of the destroyed monster while it was on the field.

PSCT.Base: When a Psychic-Type monster you control is destroyed by battle with an opponent's attacking monster: Target the opponent's monster; destroy that target, and if you do, gain LP equal to the destroyed monster's ATK on the field.
